EditTextPreference.android:title: Geofence size
EditTextPreference.app:summary: A circle around the home location that defines the area in which the automatic door control and direct control buttons will be functional. A reasonable value is between 50 and 200 m

Preference.app:summary: Setting the home location to the current location

SwitchPreference.android:title: Geofence direct control
SwitchPreference.app:summary: Activates the direct control buttons only when you are at home.

SwitchPreference.android:title: Automatic Door Control
SwitchPreference.app:summary: Activates the automatic opening of the garage door when you come home, and close when you leave

EditTextPreference.app:summary: The port address under which the MQTT server can be reachetd. The default ports are 8883 for SSL connections and 1833 for non secured connections (your setting might differ)

SwitchPreference.app:summary: MQTT can use secure socket layer communications. Enabling encrypts the MQTT messages over the public internet. If the server side supports SSL it's recomeded to turn this feature on

EditTextPreference.app:summary: The user account name for the MQTT server access
The password of the user at the MQTT server
